detail_desc: Soft, reusable, self-adhesive nipple covers in silicone. Diameter approx. 6 cm.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend.
Lined triangle bikini top with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage and ties at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and cutaway coverage at the back.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted lenses. UV-protective.
Fine-knit liner socks designed to be hidden inside your shoes. The socks have a ribbed section in the middle of the foot and elastication around the openings for optimum comfort.
Jumper in a soft knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fully lined, strapless bikini top with a frill trim at the top, removable inserts and no fasteners. The polyester content of the bikini top is recycled.

Bra with self-adhesive cups and no shoulder straps or back making it perfect for wearing under strapless or backless garments. Adjustable lacing at the front. Moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Can be washed and reused.

Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a resort collar, French front and straight-cut hem. Relaxed Fit – a straight fit with good room for movement creating a comfortable, relaxed silhouette.
